archimate:BusinessService.name: Party Lifecycle Management (old Prospect Mngmt.)/Управление Жизненным Циклом Проспекта
archimate:BusinessService.documentation: Example of use: A prospect has been identified and the bank undertakes a collection of checks to confirm this is a new relationship and to verify the relationship in compliance with bank, legal and regulatory requirements. Note that for different customer types (non consumer in particular) many different checks will be required.
